Package ball.maven.plugins.javadoc

ball-javadoc-maven-plugin Mojos.

See: Description

    Class Description
    AbstractJavadocMojo

    GenerateJavadocMapMojo
    Mojo to generate offline javadoc map.
    GenerateOptionsFileMojo
    Mojo to generate javadoc options file for maven-javadoc-plugin.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on ball-javadoc-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn ball-javadoc:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Retain
    Annotation to prevent javac from discarding package-info.class.

Package ball.maven.plugins.javadoc Description

ball-javadoc-maven-plugin Mojos.

Javadoc Maven Plugin

GoalPhaseDescription
generate-javadoc-map

Mojo to generate offline javadoc map. For each documented package, generate the following key/value pairs: package/Javadoc Root URL, package-module / Module (e.g., java.base), and package-artifact / groupId:artifactId. The package-module and package-artifact key/values are absent if no module or artifact respectively are specified. .plugin.fields .info

generate-options-filegenerate-sources

Mojo to generate javadoc options file for maven-javadoc-plugin. .plugin.fields .info

help

Display help information on ball-javadoc-maven-plugin. Call mvn ball-javadoc:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

Version:
$Revision: 8343 $
Author:
Allen D. Ball
